SELECT DISTINCT(c.company_code), c.company_exponent, c.company_charger, c.company_phone, c.company_name, '(' || a.address_number || ')' || a.address_main || ' ' || a.address_info || a.address_reference addressInfo FROM company c JOIN address_list a ON c.address_seq = a.address_seq JOIN material_of_company m ON m.company_code = c.company_code LEFT JOIN product_option o ON o.option_code = m.option_code WHERE c.section = 'CP01' AND m.discontinued = 'YN02' AND UPPER(c.company_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{companyCode}) || '%' AND UPPER(c.company_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{companyName}) || '%'
AND '(' || a.address_number || ')' || a.address_main || ' ' || a.address_info || a.address_reference LIKE '%' || #{address} || '%'
AND m.product_code = #{productCode} AND o.product_color = #{productColor} ORDER BY company_code DESC

SELECT DISTINCT(p.product_code), p.product_name, get_comm(p.unit_name) unit_name, p.unit_price FROM product_info p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.product_code = c.product_code JOIN material_of_company m ON p.product_code = m.product_code WHERE p.product_type = 'PT01' AND m.discontinued = 'YN02' AND c.lclas = #{lclas} AND c.sclas = #{sclas} AND UPPER(p.product_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%' AND UPPER(p.product_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%' AND m.company_code = #{companyCode} ORDER BY product_code DESC

SELECT DISTINCT(o.product_color), o.unit_price, NVL(( SELECT SUM(i.inventory_qy) -- 현재고량 FROM inventory i WHERE i.product_code = o.product_code AND i.product_color = o.product_color ), 0) inventory_qy, NVL(( SELECT SUM(mod.order_qy) -- 아직 처리되지 않은 기발주량 합계 FROM material_order_details mod JOIN material_order mo ON mod.mtril_order_code = mo.mtril_order_code WHERE mo.status IN ('RS01', 'RS02') -- 발주상태: 대기 혹은 부분출고 AND mod.product_code = o.product_code AND mod.product_color = o.product_color ), 0) storing_qy, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(duration)) FROM (SELECT (TRUNC(TO_DATE( (SELECT MAX(updde) FROM delivery WHERE mtril_order_code = mo.mtril_order_code) )) - TRUNC(rgsde)) duration, mo.mtril_order_code, d.product_code, d.product_color, mo.company_code FROM material_order mo JOIN material_order_details d ON mo.mtril_order_code = d.mtril_order_code WHERE mo.status = 'RS03') -- 발주에서 출고완료 상태까지의 평균값 산출 (7일 범위 이내에서 계산)) WHERE duration <= 7 AND product_code = o.product_code AND product_color = o.product_color AND company_code = m.company_code) duration FROM product_option o JOIN material_of_company m ON o.option_code = m.option_code WHERE o.product_code = #{productCode} AND o.discontinued = 'YN02'
AND m.company_code = #{companyCode} AND m.discontinued = 'YN02'
ORDER BY product_color

SELECT d.mtril_order_plan_code, d.company_code, d.company_name, d.product_code, p.product_name, d.order_qy, d.product_color, get_comm(p.unit_name) unit_name, NVL(o.unit_price, p.unit_price) unit_price FROM material_order_plan_details d JOIN product_info p ON d.product_code = p.product_code LEFT JOIN product_option o ON d.product_code = o.product_code AND d.product_color = o.product_color WHERE d.mtril_order_plan_code = #{mtrilOrderPlanCode}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.mtril_order_code, o.company_code, o.company_name, product_summary('material_order_details', o.mtril_order_code) summary, o.due_date, SUM(d.order_qy) order_qy, SUM(d.amount) amount, o.charger_name, o.remark, o.rgsde, o.update_date, get_comm(o.status) status FROM material_order o JOIN material_order_details d ON o.mtril_order_code = d.mtril_order_code
AND o.status IN ( #{st} ) AND UPPER(d.product_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productCode}) || '%' AND UPPER(get_prd_name(d.product_code)) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%' AND UPPER(o.company_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{companyCode}) || '%' AND UPPER(o.company_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{companyName}) || '%'
GROUP BY o.mtril_order_code, o.company_code, o.company_name, o.due_date, o.charger_name, o.remark, o.rgsde, o.update_date, o.status ) -- 바깥에서 검색하여 alias 이용 가능
AND UPPER(mtril_order_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{mtrilOrderCode}) || '%' AND TO_CHAR(due_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{dueMin} AND TO_CHAR(due_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{dueMax}
AND order_qy >= #{qyMin} AND order_qy <= #{qyMax} AND amount >= #{amountMin} AND amount <= #{amountMax} AND UPPER(remark) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{remark}) || '%' AND UPPER(charger_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{chargerName}) || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{rgsdeMin} AND TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{rgsdeMax}
ORDER BY mtril_order_code DESC

SELECT product_code, get_prd_name(d.product_code) product_name, product_color, order_qy, get_comm((SELECT unit_name FROM product_info WHERE product_code = d.product_code)) unit_name, unit_price, amount FROM material_order_details d WHERE mtril_order_code = #{mtrilOrderCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_order (mtril_order_code, company_code, company_name, due_date, charger_code, charger_name, remark) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH('MOD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(mtril_order_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0)) = 9 THEN null ELSE 'MOD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(mtril_order_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0) END FROM material_order WHERE TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)), ('MOD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0001')) AS mtril_order_code FROM DUAL), -- 현재 날짜로 번호 부여 #{companyCode}, #{companyName}, #{dueDate}, #{chargerCode}, #{chargerName}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO material_order_details (mtril_order_detail_code, mtril_order_code, product_code, order_qy, amount, product_color, unit_price) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(mtril_order_detail_code), 0) + 1 FROM material_order_details), -- 다음 번호 조회 (SELECT MAX(mtril_order_code) FROM material_order), #{productCode}, #{orderQy}, #{amount}, #{productColor}, #{unitPrice})

INSERT INTO material_order_plan (mtril_order_plan_code, due_date, charger_code, charger_name, remark) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH('MOP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(mtril_order_plan_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0)) = 9 THEN null ELSE 'MOP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(mtril_order_plan_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0) END FROM material_order_plan WHERE TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)), ('MOP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0001')) AS mtril_order_plan_code FROM DUAL), -- 현재 날짜로 번호 부여 #{dueDate}, #{chargerCode}, #{chargerName}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO material_order_plan_details (mtril_order_plan_detail_code, mtril_order_plan_code, company_code, company_name, product_code, order_qy, product_color) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(mtril_order_plan_detail_code), 0) + 1 FROM material_order_plan_details), -- 다음 번호 조회 (SELECT MAX(mtril_order_plan_code) FROM material_order_plan), #{companyCode}, #{companyName}, #{productCode}, #{orderQy}, #{productColor})
